# minimumFontSize

**Instance Property**

The minimum font size, in points.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var minimumFontSize: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `0`.

## Setting Rendering Preferences

- **shouldPrintBackgrounds**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to include any background color or graphics when printing content.
